TopicTitle: Reporting posts and the slow loading

Articles.Content: So I already knew that reporting posts does not return you to the previous page immediately, but you need to wait for a long time. Today it was a bit different, I just got a 504 - Gateway Timed Out from nginx. So perhaps that's the clue for site administrators to look into the issue and maybe get it fixed?
Yeah we're aware of the issue here. Once your report a post, when it starts loading, you can close the tab right away, the report is sent.
I know, I was just trying to point out the nginx issue.
